name: Hero Puzzle!
description:
Enjoy 3 puzzle gameplays in a life time adventure to save all the princesses on the world map...

1) Tower gameplay:
* You are able to attack enemy on same or lower floors.
* Who has bigger number is gonna win and inherits loser number to be stronger!
* Once you are at enemy tower, you can move up/down one floor.
* Make use of weapon, pow-ups and elements on your way...

2) Maze gameplays
* Touch on where you want to move.
* Find an optimal path to victory.

3) Dungeon gameplays
* Pull the light ropes to other nodes to make ways.
* With power like a Necromancer, you now can turn fallen enemies to your army!
* Choosing which room to conquer ea is vital for winning.

Think again before you get the game, cause you gonna be surrounded by trolls, orcs, skeletons, titans, dragons... and loads of fun!!!
